FractionArithmetic.AddLikeFractions: Add fractions %1 and %2 with the same denominator
FractionArithmetic.BringToCommonDenomina: Find a common denominator between %1 and %2
FractionArithmetic.ConvertIntegerToFract: Write %1 as a fraction with denominator 1
FractionArithmetic.DistributeFractionPos: Distribute the power to the numerator and denominator
FractionArithmetic.EvaluateProductsInNum: Evaluate the products in the numerator and the denominator
FractionArithmetic.EvaluateSumInNumerato: Evaluate the sum in the numerator
FractionArithmetic.FindCommonFactorInFra: Find the greatest common factor of the numerator and denominator of the fraction %1
FractionArithmetic.NormalizeSignsInFract: Determine the sign of the fraction and bring it to the front of the expression
FractionArithmetic.SimplifyFractionNegat: Transform to the positive power of the reciprocal fraction
FractionArithmetic.SimplifyFractionToMin: A fraction to the power of negative 1 is equal to the reciprocal of that fraction
FractionArithmetic.SimplifyNegativeInDen: Move negative denominator sign out of fraction in %1
FractionArithmetic.SimplifyNegativeInNum: Move negative numerator sign out of fraction in %1
Cancel negative signs in numerator and denominator of %1
FractionArithmetic.SubtractLikeFractions: Subtract fraction %2 from %1 with the same denominator
FractionArithmetic.TurnIntegerToMinusOne: A number to the power of negative 1 is equal to one over that number
FractionArithmetic.TurnNegativePowerOfIn: A number to the power of negative %1 is equal to one over that number to the power of %1
FractionRoots.DistributeRadicalOverFract: Apply the root separately to the numerator and denominator
FractionRoots.RationalizeDenominator: Rationalize the denominator of the fraction
FractionRoots.RationalizeSimpleDenominat: Multiply numerator and denominator by the radical currently in the denominator
General.AddClarifyingBrackets: Add brackets to get a consistent expression
General.EliminateOneInProduct: A factor of 1 can be eliminated from a product
General.EliminateZeroInSum: Any number added to zero is equal to itself
General.MoveSignOfNegativeFactorOutOfPro: Move the sign of the product in front of it
General.RemoveBracketAroundSignedInteger: Brackets can be removed from a negative term in a sum
General.RemoveBracketProductInProduct: Brackets around a product term which is itself a product can be removed
General.RemoveBracketSumInSum: Brackets around a sum term which is itself a sum can be removed
General.ReplaceInvisibleBrackets: Add brackets to make the expression clearer
General.SimplifyFractionWithOneDenominat: Simplify fraction with one in the denominator
General.SimplifyProductWithTwoNegativeFa: The product of two negative numbers is positive
IntegerArithmetic.EvaluateIntegerPowerDi: Calculate %1 to the power of %2 directly
IntegerArithmetic.RewriteIntegerPowerAsP: Expand %1 to the power of %2 as a product
IntegerArithmetic.SimplifyEvenPowerOfNeg: The even power of a negative number is positive
IntegerArithmetic.SimplifyOddPowerOfNega: The odd power of a negative number is negative
IntegerRoots.CollectLikeRootsAndSimplify: Collect like roots and simplify the coefficient
MixedNumbers.ConvertFractionToMixedNumbe: Convert the improper fraction to a mixed number
MixedNumbers.ConvertIntegersToFractions: Convert the integers to fractions with a denominator of 1
MixedNumbers.ConvertMixedNumberToSum: Convert the mixed number %0 to a sum
MixedNumbers.ConvertMixedNumbersToImprop: Convert the mixed numbers to improper fractions
MixedNumbers.ConvertMixedNumbersToSums: Convert the mixed numbers to sums of an integer and a fraction
